ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup finely chopped green onions
½ (1.25 ounce) package taco seasoning mix
½ slice American cheese, sliced into strips

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature for 30 minutes for easy mixing
Form cheese ball, wrap in plastic, and refrigerate at least 2 hours before decorating
Arrange American cheese strips as laces on the football shape for a festive presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook shape and decorate the cheese ball to look like a football with American cheese laces for a fun party presentation.
